content: was starting to write some stuff for the RFC https://hackmd.io/ZmpF0ITPRWKx6jYxgCWS7g
@nikomatsakis was wondering about the drawbacks section
I'm right now checking other RFCs to get ideas
but if someone have thoughts or things they could share would be appreciated

@Santiago Pastorino It's ok to leave that blank, I think; I can't immediately think of any drawbacks. I'm not interested in writing down the obvious one of "language gets more complex", I think a good thing to think about is "what doors get closed by adopting this approach" -- e.g., are there other kinds of negativity that we are ruling out?
